system.description: You can read other people like a book and smell a lie a mile off.
system.basicAction: You gain a +1 bonus to INSIGHT tests to see if someone is lying or trying to pull the wool over your eyes.
system.advAction: Not only can you spot the lie, but you can see the truth thatâ€™s being hidden. For every success beyond the first on an INSIGHT test you can ask the GM a question about the lie and the truth it conceals. They must answer as truthfully as possible.
